column10: Detailed Description
Forward steps with back knee hovering 1 inch off ground.
Step back and drop hip vertically; drive through front heel.
column11: No lateral wobbling at the knee.

column10: Drive up onto box; slow 3-sec descent to the floor.
Chest to floor; elbows at 45 degrees; core locked tight.
Glutes squeezed; no sagging in the lower back.
Elbow under shoulder; hips stacked and driven high.
V-sit position; rotate shoulders fully side-to-side.
Opposite arm/leg reach while pushing back into floor.
On all fours; reach and hold for 2s with flat back.
Rapid dip and explosion; land softly in a partial squat.
Reach high on toes; slam ball down using only core.
Chest to floor; explosive jump with overhead clap.
Drive knees to chest rapidly while in push-up plank.
Deep lunge; elbow to instep; rotate arm to sky.
Walk hands out to plank and feet up to hands.
Lying face down; reach foot toward opposite hand.
Cycle between arched and rounded back with breath.
Seated; rotate knees side to side without using hands.
Swing leg forward/backward with locked knee.
Swing leg side-to-side across the body.
Bar on traps; descend until hip crease is below knee.
Bar on front delts; elbows up; vertical torso.
Hold weight at chest; push knees out on descent.
Controlled descent; do not lock out knees at top.
Squeeze quads at full extension; slow release.
Rear foot elevated; focus on depth and front quad.
Flat back; drive through floor; lockout at hips.
Wide stance; vertical shins; focus on glute drive.
Hinge at hips; lower bar to mid-shin; feel stretch.
Similar to RDL but with nearly locked knees.
Use hams to pull body up; slow 4-sec descent.
Pull heels to glutes; keep hips pressed into pad.
Touch chest; explosive press; feet planted.
45-degree angle; focus on upper chest stretch.
Neutral or 45-degree grip; deeper ROM than bar.
Stand tall; press bar overhead; head through at top.
Rotate palms from facing you to facing away.
Lean forward for chest; stay vertical for triceps.
Raise arms to shoulder height; no swinging.
Pull bar to chin; lead with elbows.
Full extension to chin over bar; no kipping.
Pull bar to upper chest; squeeze lats.
45-degree hinge; pull bar to belly button.
Pull DB to hip; keep shoulders square.
Sit tall; pull handle to stomach; squeeze blades.
Straddle bar; pull with narrow grip to chest.
Pull rope to forehead; pull ends apart.
Bent over; fly arms out like wings.
Elevate shoulders to ears; hold 1s.
Full ROM; no rocking torso.
Neutral grip (thumbs up); squeeze at top.
Arms on pad; isolates bicep completely.
Seated; elbow against inner thigh.
Overhand grip; builds thick forearms.
Lock elbows at sides; extend arms fully.
Lower bar to forehead; extend upward.
Weight behind head; extend arms to sky.
Rise onto toes; 2-sec pause at top.
Lean against wall; lift toes toward shins.
Hang from bar; lift toes to touch bar.
Diagonal pull across body; pivot back foot.
Hold handle at chest; press out and resist pull.
Hinge at hips; snap glutes to swing bell.
Fast, controlled walk with heavy load.
